SA15bsa0551u:6: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
SA15bsa0551u:8: yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:12: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
SA15bsa0551u:14: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham /
SA15bsa0551u:15: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:18: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
SA15bsa0551u:22: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15bsa0551u:24: anyathāsati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
SA15bsa0551u:26: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
SA15bsa0551u:28: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt; kathaṃ tat pratītivyavasthā /
SA15bsa0551u:34: tasmādvidhyākārāvagrahādadhyakṣavadvikalpasyāpi vidhiviṣayatvameva nānyāpohaviṣayatvamiti kathamapohaḥ śabdārtho ghuṣyate // atrābhidhīyate //
SA15bsa0551u:38: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
SA15bsa0551u:39: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
SA15bsa0551u:42: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
SA15bsa0551u:46: tathāpi nāpratipattireva, viśeṣaṇabhūtasyānyāpohasya agavāpoḍha eva gośabdasya niveśitatvāt /
SA15bsa0551u:47: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
SA15bsa0551u:48: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam /
SA15bsa0551u:52: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:58: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
SA15bsa0551u:59: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
SA15bsa0551u:63: vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
SA15bsa0551u:69: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0551u:74: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
SA15bsa0551u:81: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva; aprakṛta pathāntarāpekṣayā eṣa eva /
SA15bsa0551u:84: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:93: yathāpratibhāsaṃ buḍdhyākāraśca; tatra vāhyorthodhyavasāyādeva śabdavācyo vyavasthāpyate /
SA15bsa0551u:97: indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet? atrāpyuktam /
SA15bsa0551u:100: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:102: tathā sati vastuna eva bhedaprāpteḥ; na hi svarūpabhedādaparo vastubhedaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:103: na ca pratibhāsabhedādapara svarūpabhedaḥ; anyathā trailokyamekameva vastu syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:104: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet?
SA15bsa0551u:107: tato yatrārthakriyābhedādisacivaḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ tatra vastubhedaḥ, ghaṭavat /
SA15bsa0551u:110: na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti /
SA15bsa0551u:114: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
SA15bsa0551u:116: tasya hi sadbhāvestīti vyartha, nāstītyasamartham; asadbhāve nāstīti vyarthamastī tyasamartham /
SA15bsa0551u:118: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
SA15bsa0551u:119: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
SA15bsa0551u:120: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
SA15bsa0551u:124: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
SA15bsa0551u:136: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
SA15bsa0551u:137_1: bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham /
SA15bsa0551u:138: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
SA15bsa0551u:140: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet?
SA15bsa0551u:145: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa?
SA15bsa0551u:146: asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:147_0: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa
SA15bsa0551u:147_1: pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no
SA15bsa0551u:149: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:154: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
SA15bsa0551u:156: yacca vācaspatiḥ; nacaikopādhinā sattve viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte; upādhyanta raviśiṣṭatabgdrahaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:158: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
SA15bsa0551u:162: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam /
SA15bsa0551u:166: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:168: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:171: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam //
SA15bsa0551u:173: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo 'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante /
SA15bsa0551u:180: vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
SA15bsa0551u:182: sarvvathā nirvviṣayaḥ khalvayaṃ sāmānyapratyayaḥ; kva sāmānyavārttā?
SA15bsa0551u:190: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
SA15bsa0551u:192: gotvādeva gopiṇḍaḥ, anyathā turagopi gopiṇḍaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:193: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:194: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
SA15bsa0551u:197: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet?
SA15bsa0551u:199: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati?
SA15bsa0551u:200: yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā /
SA15bsa0551u:201: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:203: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
SA15bsa0551u:208: iheti buddheḥ samavāyasiddhiriheti dhīśca dvayadarśane syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:210: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam /
SA15bsa0551u:217: tasmāt, tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15bsa0551u:220: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti /
SA15bsa0551u:224: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
SA15bsa0551u:242: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
SA15bsa0551u:244: vādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmmādyupā dhicakrasya, kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣam /
SA15bsa0551u:248: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau /
SA15bsa0551u:251: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye 'pratibhāsanāt /
SA15bsa0551u:252: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato 'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau /
SA15bsa0551u:255: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
SA15bsa0551u:258: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
SA15bsa0551u:262: yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:267: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:268: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva /
SA15bsa0551u:270: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam //
SA15bsa0551u:283: sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddheḥ, gatyantarābhāvāt / aviṣayatve ca vācakatvāyogāt / tatra /
SA15bsa0551u:286: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:288: arthaścaiko 'dhyāsato bhāsato 'nyaḥ sthāpyo vācyastattvato naiva kaścit //
SA15bsa0551u:292: tatrādṛḍhe sarvvamayatnaśīrṇaṃ dṛḍhe tu sausthyannanu tāvataiva //
